items.summary: Remove the production console warning `Detected both agent and agentOptions passed to createActor. Ignoring agentOptions and proceeding with the provided agent.` by ensuring the frontend actor creation path passes only one of `agent` or `agentOptions` to the underlying `createActor` implementation (including the authenticated identity case in `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`).

Update the global Navbar header UI so a menu icon is visible on desktop/web and is positioned at the top-right of the page, and clicking it opens the same right-side navigation sheet currently used on mobile.
